rules_text:
Whenever equipped creature attacks, look at the top seven cards of your library. You may reveal a land card from among those cards and put it onto the battlefield. Put the rest of the cards on the bottom of your library in a random order. If you do not reveal a land card this way, equipped creature explores twice.
 Equip {1} [i]({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)[/i]
